transcript:
"I should think he has a score of them." 
Princess Anna MikMylovna intervened in the conversation, evidently wishing to show her connections and knowledge of what went on in society. 
"The fact of the matter is," said she signifi- cantly, and also in a half whisper, "everyone knows Count Cyril's reputation. ... He has lost count of his children, but this Pierre was his favorite." 
"How handsome the old man still was only a year ago!" remarked the countess. "I have never seen a handsomer
